text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ

translation.en: Those are the ones upon whom the word has come into effect, [who will be] among nations which had passed on before them of jinn and men. Indeed, they [all] were losers
translation.id: Mereka itu orang-orang yang telah pasti terkena ketetapan (azab) bersama umat-umat dahulu sebelum mereka, dari (golongan) jin dan manusia. Mereka adalah orang-orang yang rugi
